title: Compare byeri  and reliquiary of Ste Foy-function

content.prompt: The Fang byeri are most similar in terms of function to which of the following works?

choices.label: Jowo Rinpoche, enshrined in the Jokhang Temple
Statues of votive figures, from the Square Temple at Eshnunna

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
